TEXT.TITLE: CONSOLIDATED FREIGHTWAYS <CNF> FORMS NEW UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Consolidated Frieghtways Corp said it has formed a new regional less-than-truckload carrier called Con-Way Southern Express. The company said the new unit will start overnight service April One in the Carolinas, Georgia, Tennessee and Virginia. Reuter
